data.name: BOT re logwood
data.desc: King instructs Board of Trade to furnish 'all papers belonging to this Councell concerning Cutting Logwood'
data.prim_n: LC Phillipps MS 8539 part 1 ff 9, 24-25, 71-72 [Council for Foreign Plantations, Journal, 1670-86, 3v]
data.note:
Logwood question considered in BOT < 1674 eg Jun-Nov 1670 Modyford to BOT in 120-122 CSPC 7 / 28 Sep 1670 in 108 CSPPC 7 / 18 Dec 1670 in 142 CSPC 7 / 25 Dec 1671 in 310 CSPC 7 / 10 May 1672 in 357-359 CSPC 7 / 3-5 Nov 1672 in 425-428 CSPC 7 / 1 Jan 1673 in 1016 CSPC 7 /v Botella-Ordinas 143-144, 161 no 6
 See also 27 Feb-11 Mar 1674 in 556-559 CSPC 7 / 20 Nov 1674 in 622-624 CSPC 7 /v Botella-Ordinas 161 no 11
